attribute_definitions.name: Poster image transformation
attribute_definitions.description: Specify a custom transformation using URL syntax. This overrides any other transformations, including those in the advanced configuration settings.

attribute_definitions.name: Video aspect ratio
attribute_definitions.description: Specify a custom transformation using URL syntax. This overrides any other transformations, including those in the advanced configuration settings.

attribute_definitions.name: Video Aspect Ratio
attribute_definitions.description: Specify a custom aspect ratio. This overrides the aspect ratio set in the advanced configuration settings.
